actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to repeal the provisions of law allowing automatic cost-of-living adjustments in the salaries of Members of Congress.

summary.text: Amends the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946 to eliminate automatic cost-of-living adjustments in the salaries of Members of Congress.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the provisions of law allowing automatic cost-of-living adjustments in the salaries of Members of Congress.
